alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Lake of the Woods; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 6:01PM CDT until June 01 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Southwestern Lake of the Woods County in north central Minnesota... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 601 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gates Corner, or 33 miles southeast of Roseau, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norris Camp, Gates Corner and Faunce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Grand Forks.

area.areaDesc: Beltrami; Lake of the Woods; Roseau
